abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column says Comptroller Scott M Stringer has approved payments of $37.8 million in seven high-profile cases that involved claims of abuses of power, including police death of Eric Garner and wrongful imprisonment of others; says no explanations of wrongdoing have been offered in spite of payments.
lead_paragraph: In concluding, without explanation, that the Garner estate should be paid, Scott Stringer has extended the silence in a new direction.

headline.main: City Comptroller’s Office Dispenses Few Answers but Writes Real Checks
headline.print_headline: City Comptroller’s Office Writes Real Checks but Dispenses Few Answers

snippet: In concluding, without explanation, that the Garner estate should be paid, Scott Stringer has extended the silence in a new direction.
